entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 27 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 14 January 2023
